tempconverter

Class TempConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tempconverter.TempConverter

  • final class TempConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple temperature converter between Fahrenheit and Celsius.
    Version:
    10/11/2018
    Author:
    NTropy

      • TEMP_DIFF

        private static final double TEMP_DIFF
        Variables for conversion between standards. TEMP_DIFF the value subtracted from or added to temperature to scale TEMP_FRAC the conversion ratio
